name: Singer of Many Waters
description:
End Phase: Heal all your characters for 1 HP. If your side has characters with no more than 5 HP, heal the most injured character for an additional 1 HP.
Usages: 2 (Can stack. Max 4 stacks)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Heal all your characters for 1 HP. If your side has characters with no more than 5 HP, heal the most injured character for an additional 1 HP.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages: 2</color> (Can stack. Max 4 stacks)
